panels.description: Percentage of chunks that are filtered by using bloom filters
panels.title: Filter ratio

panels.description: Percentage of chunks that are filtered by using bloom filters
panels.title: Filter ratio

targets.expr:
(
    max by (pod, reason) (kube_pod_container_status_last_terminated_reason{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-gateway"})
    * on (pod) group_left
    sum by (pod) (increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-gateway"}[$__rate_interval]))
) > 0

sum by(instance, pod) (rate(node_disk_read_bytes_total[$__rate_interval]))
+ ignoring(pod) group_right() 
(count by(instance, pod) (container_fs_reads_bytes_total{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container="bloom-gateway", device!~".*sda.*"}) * 0)

sum by(instance, pod) (rate(node_disk_written_bytes_total[$__rate_interval]))
+ ignoring(pod) group_right() 
(count by(instance, pod) (container_fs_writes_bytes_total{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container="bloom-gateway", device!~".*sda.*"}) * 0)

sum by (pod) (loki_bloom_gateway_queue_duration_seconds_sum{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"})
/
sum by (pod) (loki_bloom_gateway_queue_duration_seconds_count{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"})

panels.description: For how long do pending tasks stay in the queue
panels.title: Queue Latency

panels.description: Inflight requests tracks all tasks both queued and in progress
panels.title: Inflight tasks
Processing time for tasks (per worker iteration)
We cache bloom blocks in memory to prevent the gateway from hitting the object store too often

targets.expr:
sum(loki_embeddedcache_memory_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", cache="bloom-blocks-cache", container="bloom-gateway"})
/
sum(loki_embeddedcache_entries{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", cache="bloom-blocks-cache", container="bloom-gateway"})

panels.title: The gateway download bloom meta files and blocks from the object store.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (operation, le) (rate(loki_gcs_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-gateway"} [$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (operation, le) (rate(loki_gcs_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-gateway"} [$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (operation, le) (rate(loki_gcs_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-gateway"} [$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (operation, le) (rate(loki_s3_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-gateway"} [$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (operation, le) (rate(loki_s3_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-gateway"} [$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (operation, le) (rate(loki_s3_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-gateway"} [$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (operation, le) (rate(loki_azure_blob_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-gateway"} [$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (operation, le) (rate(loki_azure_blob_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-gateway"} [$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (operation, le) (rate(loki_azure_blob_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-gateway"} [$__rate_interval])))
topk(3, sum by (tasks) (count_over_time({namespace="loki-dev-006", container="bloom-gateway"} |= "process tasks with bounds" | logfmt [5s])))
max(max_over_time({cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-gateway"} |= "fetch blocks" | logfmt | unwrap duration(duration) [$__auto]))
avg(avg_over_time({cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-gateway"} |= "fetch blocks" | logfmt | unwrap duration(duration) [$__auto]))
avg(avg_over_time({cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-gateway"} |= "request unavailable blocks in the background" | logfmt | missing > 0 | unwrap missing [$__auto]))
sort_desc(topk(10, sum by (tasks) (count_over_time({namespace="loki-dev-006", container="bloom-gateway"} |= "process tasks with bounds" | logfmt [$__auto]))))
